title: Amoroso: Looking to ECB for info on corporate bond purchases
itunes:title: Amoroso: Looking to ECB for info on corporate bond purchases
description:
JPMorgan's Anastasia Amoroso sits down to discuss the ECB and oil prices on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
